message: Hi Bob, I'm interested in selling you a great product. I think you'll really like it. Would you like to make an offer for it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120
I understand you're looking to save a bit on the price. I can offer you a compromise. How about $140?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $130
I can see you're still interested in the product, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $135?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $132
